comment: Professor Myers is a kind soul. She encourages collaboration with peers. The discussion boards were broken down into small groups so you could actually read the other 3-4 students responses and have a discussion. I also appreciated that she was quick to respond to any questions and she gives you choices on how to exhibit your learning.

Dr. Myers was my professor through the COVID pandemic and she is amazing. She was great beforehand, but she made the transition super easy for us and every week she made sure we were okay and not just doing our work. She is knowledgeable and I feel like I learned so much from her as well.

Dr. Myers was my professor throughout the COVID19 pandemic. While all my other professors thought this was the perfect time to increase the workload, Dr. Myers not only made life incredibly easy on us, she took the time to individually call us on Zoom to do a check in on us personally and academically. I cannot say enough good things about her.

This semester we obviously were affected by the virus so we had to switch to online for half of the semester. Both in class and online Professor Myers was great! She has such a sweet personality. She doesn't really teach and just gives worksheets to work on with classmates that are pretty simple with a partner. Take her if you can!
Dr. Myers is the best!! class is laidback but informative, she is there to help you and is the coolest professor ever. Take her class!!!!
Great professor! She is really caring and teaches very well. She can also be funny at times. Attendance is a must.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Dr. Myers made transitioning to major based classes so much easier. Her classes were interactive and she is a genuine person, I was never scared to speak up in class. The field experience was fun and the assignments were not hard at all. Weekly modules with super easy assignments. Two quizzes. Would highly recommend.

Whether you know if you want to be a teacher or you have no idea, take Dr. Myers. SHE'S AMAZING! She's very relaxed, willing to work with you, and doesn't ask for too much. There are about 4 Group Projects and 10 Online Modules (About 1/Week covering about 1 Chapter/Week), but they're all very easy. Take her if you have the chance!

Super personable professor, is willing to work with you and doesn't ask too much of you. You will learn a lot about teaching just by her teaching style, and then her lectures will add to it. Expect group projects, but they are not overwhelming!
